飂字的基本解释

飂
liù
飘：“飂兮若无止。”
古国名，在今中国河南省唐河县南。
姓。

飂
liáo
〔飂戾（

飂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liù］
［《廣韻》力救切，去宥，來。］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
(1)高风，风疾速貌。
(2)指西风。参见“飂風”。
(3)古国名。在今河南省唐河县南八十里。
(4)姓。高阳氏之后有飂氏。见宋罗泌《路史·疏仡纪·高阳》。
[②]［liáo］
［《集韻》憐蕭切，平蕭，來。］
亦作“1”。
(1)疾貌。参见“飂2戾”、“飂2淚”。
(2)阴冷貌。
(3)象声词。风声。参见“飂2戾”。

飂字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　飂； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1414第20
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力求切，音劉。高風貌。【淮南子·覽冥訓】至隂飂飂，至陽赫赫。　又【集韻】憐蕭切，音聊。義同。【潘岳·西征賦】吐淸風之飂戾。【註】音聊。　又力救切，音溜。義同。　又【正韻】國名。高陽氏之後。【五音集韻】在南陽湘陽。　又姓。【左傳·昭二十九年】昔有飂叔安。【註】飂，國名。叔安，君名。【音義】力謬反。　又【集韻】力竹切，音六。義同。　【集韻】或作?、飀，通作翏。

飂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
飂字的起名意思

形容高风疾速的样子，也指风声，也用作古国名。

Basic explanation of words
Fringe
liù
Gone with the wind: "Bai Xi is endless."
The name of the ancient country is in the south of Tanghe County, Henan Province, China.
name.

Fringe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liù］
["Guangyun" tries to save Qi, go to You, come. ]
["Guangyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
(1) The appearance of high wind and fast wind.
(2) Refers to the westerly wind. See "Bai Feng".
(3) Ancient country name. In today's Tanghe County, Henan Province, south of eighty miles.
(4) Last name. After the Gaoyang clan, there is the Pi clan. See Song Luo Mi's "Road History·Shuge Ji·Gao Yang".
[②]［liáo］
["Ji Yun" Ping Xiaoqie, Ping Xiao, come. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Disease appearance. See "Bai 2 戾", "Bai 2 Tears".
(2) Gloomy appearance.
(3) Onomatopoeia. Wind. See "Bian 2 戾".
Fringe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　飂; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1414 No. 20
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Strive to cut, sound Liu. High style. [Huainanzi·Lan Mingxun] To the yin-border, to the yang-hehe.　[Jiyun] Pity and sorrow, voice chat. The same meaning. [Pan Yue·Xizheng Fu] The spit of wind. [Note] Voice chat.　I tried to save the cut again, and the sound slipped. The same meaning.　[Zhengyun] The name of the country. After Gao Yang's. 【Pentagram Rhyme】in Xiangyang, Nanyang.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan · XXIX] There used to be Shuan Bing. [Note] Bian, the name of the country. Shuan, the king's name. [Sound and meaning] Li Miu reversed.　[Jiyun] Lizhu cut, sound six. The same meaning.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo?, Cha, and Tong Zuo.

Fringe
Name meaning
Describes the appearance of high winds, also refers to the sound of the wind, and is also used as the name of an ancient country.
liáo, liù
I liáo сущ.
свист (шум) ветра
II liù собств.
1) Лю (назв. древнего государства)
2) Лю (фамилия)
